nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Jedi vs. Sith

Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Jedi vs. Sith is a Star Wars Legends reference book that compiles content previously published in Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Who Are the Jedi? and Star Wars: The Clone Wars: What Is a Sith Warrior? (2012) from author Glenn Dakin. It was published by DK Publishing in 2014.
